title: Fight the system!
subtitle: ...not the website system
body.1: We've run in to an error. A squad of highly trained digital activists have been dispatched to deal with the problem and we should be up and running shortly.
body.2: We'd recommend giving whatever you were trying to do another go - you never know, we might have fixed it already.
body.3: Rest assured, this has been logged. If you were in the middle of signing up to the IWGB, we'll get in touch (if we're able to) later to pick up the pieces.
body.4: If you see our tech squad around, then tell them this:
